itemDescription: British Labour Party politician and life peer (born 1950)

wikipedia_page.main: Keith John Charles Bradley, Baron Bradley, PC (born 17 May 1950, in Birmingham) is a British Labour Party politician and life peer. He was formerly the Labour Member of Parliament (MP) for Manchester Withington from 1987 until 2005.

response: *  1950   – Keith Bradley, Baron Bradley, English accountant and politician
